speedytax 1.0.4
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Import SINTAX Taxonomy Table

    import_sintax_tax_table.Rd

    Imports taxonomy files created with USEARCH and vsearch sintax commands

    import_sintax_tax_table(in_file, confidence)

    Arguments

    in_file

    A fix-rank tab-delimited text file output by SINTAX

    confidence

    The confidence level for filtering the taxonomy (0.8 by default)

    Value

    A phyloseq tax_table object

    Details

    This function works with both vsearch and USEARCH sintax results.

    A confidence value of 0.8 is recommended for full-length 16S rRNA gene sequences and a value of 0.5 is recommended for shorter amplicons.

    References

    Rognes T, Flouri T, Nichols B, Quince C, Mahé F. (2016) VSEARCH: a versatile open source tool for metagenomics. PeerJ 4:e2584. doi: 10.7717/peerj.2584

    Edgar RC (2016) SINTAX: a simple non-Bayesian taxonomy classifier for 16S and ITS sequences. bioRxiv. doi:10.1101/074161

    Examples

    # With a vsearch sintax result
taxonomy_file <- system.file("extdata", "vsearch_sintax_table.tsv", package = "speedytax")
example_tax_table <- import_sintax_tax_table(in_file = taxonomy_file)
example_tax_table
#> Taxonomy Table:     [10 taxa by 6 taxonomic ranks]:
#>           Domain       Phylum             Class                  
#> OTU_03562 "k_Bacteria" "p_Bacteroidetes"  "c_Cytophagia"         
#> OTU_03044 "k_Bacteria" "p_Actinobacteria" "c_Thermoleophilia"    
#> OTU_07012 "k_Bacteria" "p_Proteobacteria" "c_Betaproteobacteria" 
#> OTU_07818 "k_Bacteria" "p_Proteobacteria" "c_Betaproteobacteria" 
#> OTU_05975 "k_Bacteria" "p_Proteobacteria" "c_Betaproteobacteria" 
#> OTU_04162 "k_Bacteria" "p_Proteobacteria" "c_Betaproteobacteria" 
#> OTU_02996 "k_Bacteria" "p_Proteobacteria" "c_Betaproteobacteria" 
#> OTU_08022 "k_Bacteria" "p_Proteobacteria" "c_Gammaproteobacteria"
#> OTU_08492 "k_Bacteria" "p_Proteobacteria" "c_Betaproteobacteria"

#> OTU_03562 "o_Cytophagales"        "f_Cytophagaceae"

#> OTU_07012 "o_Burkholderiales"     "f_Oxalobacteraceae"        
#> OTU_07818 "o_Burkholderiales"     "f_Oxalobacteraceae"        
#> OTU_05975 "o_Burkholderiales"     "f_Comamonadaceae"          
#> OTU_04162 "o_Burkholderiales"     "f_Alcaligenaceae"          
#> OTU_02996 "o_Burkholderiales"     "f_Oxalobacteraceae"        
#> OTU_08022 "o_Xanthomonadales"     "f_Xanthomonadaceae"        
#> OTU_08492 "o_Burkholderiales"     "f_Oxalobacteraceae"        
#> OTU_08769 "o_Rhizobiales"         "f_Methylocystaceae"

# With a USEARCH sintax result
taxonomy_file <- system.file("extdata", "usearch_sintax_table.tsv", package = "speedytax")
example_tax_table <- import_sintax_tax_table(in_file = taxonomy_file)
example_tax_table
#> Taxonomy Table:     [10 taxa by 6 taxonomic ranks]:
#>                                  Domain       Phylum                       
#> dc01606f995091a4a41ad216f02a265b "d_Bacteria" "p_Cyanobacteria/Chloroplast"
